whosTraveling.title: Who's traveling?
whosTraveling.instructionalAirText:
Each traveler's name must match the name on his/her government-issued photo ID. Airlines do not allow passengers to transfer tickets or to change names on tickets.

Traveling with an infant? The airlines require you to inform them of all infants you are traveling with, even if some of them are on your lap. Search again if you need to add infants to this trip.

ticketType.title: Flight ticket type:
ticketType.lowCostCarrierNoticeText:
You have selected a flight from a low cost airline (shown by {0} ).

After you enter your details on our website, {Brand} will pass these to the low cost airline on your behalf. The booking will be made directly between you and the low cost airline. After completing the booking you will receive two booking confirmations by email, one from the airline and one from {Brand} . The reference received from the airline is required for check in.

It is your responsibility to ensure that all details of your booking are correct before proceeding. Once you are satisfied, click CONTINUE BOOKING.

For any changes or cancellations, you must contact the airline directly, quoting their reference.

Additionally we must inform you that most low cost airlines charge an additional credit card fee of up to 3.50 per person or 5.00 per booking, whichever is the higher, which will be detailed in the confirmation received from the airline. This charge may be in another currency (e.g. CHF, Euro, SKK). Low cost airlines may also charge additional fees for checked baggage and for in-flight food and drink.

  • If each fare has an airline change fee, then the highest fee applies to each traveler.

changeCancelAir.changeElectronicTerms:
For each ticket changed, you will be responsible for up to three charges:

  • Airline change fee
  • {Brand} exchange fee
  • Fare difference, if new flight costs more

Name changes not allowed.

Airlines do not allow passengers to change the name on a ticket or transfer the ticket to someone else.

Changing airlines not allowed.

You cannot exchange a ticket from one airline to another.

Flying standby may be an option.

Your airline may allow you to board an earlier or later flight, on the same day of departure. You must contact the airline ahead of time to make such arrangements. Some carriers charge a standby fee.
changeCancelAir.changePaperTermsHeader: Rules for changing a paper ticket
changeCancelAir.changePaperTerms:
In addition to change fees, you will also be responsible for the cost of returning your cancelled ticket and shipping your replacement ticket. If you have lost your ticket, there is a replacement fee of {0} .

For each ticket changed, you will be responsible for up to four charges:

  • Airline change fee
  • {Brand} exchange fee
  • Paper ticket shipping fee
  • Fare difference, if new flight costs more

Name changes not allowed.

Airlines do not allow passengers to change the name on a ticket or transfer the ticket to someone else.

Changing airlines not allowed.

You cannot exchange a ticket from one airline to another.

Flying standby may be an option.

Your airline may allow you to board an earlier or later flight, on the same day of departure. You must contact the airline ahead of time to make such arrangements. Some carriers charge a standby fee.

hotelTaxesAndFees.hotelTaxesFeesText: This website allows you to compare and purchase a variety of travel products from our suppliers. We are not the provider of the products that you purchase and we do not collect or remit taxes to taxing authorities. Our suppliers require us to pay amounts for the taxes and other government fees that they must pay to taxing authorities. In order to recover these amounts, we add a charge to your bill as displayed here and included in the total cost shown. The charge covers any taxes and government fees applicable to the travel products you have purchased.
hotelTaxesAndFees.hotelTaxesFeesLabel: Hotel taxes and fees for this purchase
hotelCharges.packageTaxesFeesAndChargesH: Package Taxes, Fees, and Hotel Charges
hotelCharges.packageIntroText:
{Brand} packages include all taxes, so you can have the most accurate pricing information up front to help make well-informed decisions.

We also add most fees into our pricing, including airport access fees and customer facility charges.

Our prices do not include extra options you request, such as upgrades and special equipment, or fees charged by the travel supplier when you arrive at your destination.

Each traveler's name must match the name on his/her passport. This will avoid delay when you pass through immigration at your destination.

If you do not currently have all of the information, enter what you know and you can fill in the rest later by accessing this form by logging into the ''My Trips'' section of the web site and clicking on the specific trip.

If you have an infant that will be riding in a lap, you will be asked to give his/her information at the airport.

creditCard.3DSecurePopupVI.text:
The Verified by Visa service gives Visa cardholders a free extra layer of protection against unauthorized purchases online.

Visa cardholders can enroll in the Verified by Visa service at no charge. If you activate your card, it will be recognized whenever you purchase at a participating online stores, like {Brand}.

You'll be asked to enter your password in a Verified by Visa pop-up window, your identity will be verified, and the transaction will be completed.

At online stores that don’t participate in Verified by Visa, your Visa card will continue to work as usual.
creditCard.3DSecurePopupMC.text:
MasterCard SecureCode is a simple and secure way to protect against unauthorized use of your card when shopping at participating online stores, like {Brand}.

If you’re a cardholder who has signed up for the SecureCode service, you will be prompted to enter your private SecureCode, similar to an ATM password, in a secure pop-up window.

Once you enter your SecureCode, your financial institution will confirm your identity in seconds and your purchase can be completed.

railFlyReminder.message:
Dear {0},

In addition to your flight from Germany, you have also booked transfer by rail to a German airport. This e-mail contains information on the service offered with your electronic ticket and how to collect the ticket. Please read the message carefully and contact {Brand} for any questions you may have.


Rail&Fly -the service offered
For the rail portion of your trip, you are able to ride:
  • on the entire DB rail network to/from any German airport
  • on all DB trains (incl. ICE) except Thalys, DB Autozug, and special trains. However, DB Nachtzug and ICE Sprinter trains are subject to compulsory reservation and a supplement is charged which you can buy at any DB sales outlet

When departing Germany, the Rail&Fly coupons are valid on the day prior to departure and on the day of departure. When arriving in Germany, the Rail&Fly coupons are valid on the day of arrival and the day after arrival.

  • Journeys within regional transport associations are not permitted
  • Journeys in the direction of your destination and timetable-related detours are permitted

How can you obtain your train ticket?

You can obtain your train ticket at any Deutsche Bahn ticket-vending machine for long-distance transport. Please do this only shortly before your departure since after collecting your ticket it is not possible to change the date of travel.

  • First choose the language for the user menu you wish and follow the instructions for "Rail&Fly"
  • For authentication purposes, enter your booking number (Bahn Ticket Number shown below).
  • Repeat the input until all of your train tickets have been printed for all passengers.
  • The train ticket will be valid for both departure and arrival.
  • Please keep your ticket safe since it will not be replaced if lost and you will have to buy a new ticket.
  • If you are not able to draw your ticket due to a technical fault, please make sure you draw the Rail&Fly ticket at the end of the onward train journey.

What do you require for your rail journey?
Please make sure you have the following documents with you for the rail journey:
  • ID card or passport
  • flight booking confirmation with e-ticket number
  • train ticket

What can you do if you use your Rail&Fly ticket only in part or not at all?

Contact {Brand}. The airline requires the Rail&Fly ticket to be returned. Rebooking and cancellation fees vary from airline to airline. When you call, we will be able to supply more information.
The tickets are printed on heat-sensitive paper. Protect them from exposure to the sun, moisture and heat. We wish you a pleasant journey.

changeCancelAir.changeRailTicketTerms:
If you have not yet printed out your rail ticket, you can make changes to the rail portion of your trip.

If, however, you have printed out your rail tickets, you will need to mail those tickets to {Brand}. Additional fees may be charged until we have received those tickets. When calling to make the change, an {namePosessive} agent will explain to you any charges you will incur and give you the address required to mail the tickets back.
changeCancelAir.cancelRailTicketTerms:
If the air portion of your trip is unrefundable, then the train tickets are unrefundable.

If you have a refundable ticket and have already printed out your rail tickets, then you will need to mail those tickets back to {Brand} in order to be refunded for that portion of your trip. If your tickets are refundable and you have not printed out your train tickets, then you will receive the full refund at once.

hotelMealType.ROOM_SERVICE: Continental breakfast must be served in the room. Minimum requirement is bread/rolls, jam and a hot drink.
hotelMealType.CHINESE_BR: Includes congee (porridge-like rice soup) with noodles, fish and rice.
hotelMealType.IRISH_BR: Hot breakfast served at the table. Minimum hot bacon and eggs. May include black and/or white pudding and potato bread. A hot drink is included.
hotelMealType.SCAND_BR: Cold, self-served breakfast. Minimum requirements include bread/rolls, jam and a hot drink, ham, cheese or fruit, fruit juices, cereals, and salads.
hotelMealType.SCOTTISH_BR: Hot breakfast served at the table. Minimum hot bacon and eggs. May include haggis, black pudding and/or porridge. A hot drink is included.
hotelMealType.BOXED_BR: Boxed breakfast provided by the hotel to 'take out'.
hotelMealType.AMER_BR: Hot breakfast served at the table. Minimum hot bacon and eggs.
hotelMealType.COLD_BUFFET_BR: Cold, self-served breakfast. Minimum requirements include bread/rolls, jam and a hot drink, ham, cheese or fruit, fruit juices, cereals, and salads.
hotelMealType.CONT_BR: Cold breakfast usually served at the table. Minimum requirement is bread/rolls, jam and a hot drink. May include ham, cheese or fruit.
hotelMealType.ENGLISH_BR: Hot breakfast served at the table. Minimum hot bacon and eggs. May include extra hot foods such as sausages, tomatoes, baked beans and fried bread. A hot drink is included.
hotelMealType.ASAIN_BR: Includes congee (porridge-like rice soup), fish and rice.
hotelMealType.HOT_BUFFET_BR: Hot breakfast can be self service or served at the table, depending on the hotel. The minimum requirement includes bread/rolls, jam, hot drinks, ham, cheese or fruit, fruit juices, cereals, salads, hot bacon, and eggs.
hotelMealType.ISRAELI_BR: Cold, self-served breakfast. Minimum requirement is bread/rolls, jam and a hot drink, cheese or fruit plus fruit juices, cereals and salads excluding meat and shellfish.
hotelMealType.JAPANESE_BR: Includes miso soup, rice and fish.
hotelMealType.WELSH_BR: Hot breakfast served at the table. Minimum hot bacon and eggs. May include extra hot foods such as sausages, tomatoes, baked beans and fried bread. A hot drink is included.
hotelMealType.MOROCCAN_BR: Hot breakfast served at the table. Minimum hot bacon and eggs.

onlinePaymentCancelledHtml.introMessage:
We did not receive your online payment from {0} within 20 minutes. We had to cancel your trip: {1}.

  • Here are some reasons why we may not have received your online payment.
  • Your payment request did not complete before the specified time.
  • The online payment was not accepted by {0}.
  • A network problem caused the funds transfer to fail.

Try correcting the problem. Then re-book your trip and try online payment again or use another type of payment.

If you have questions, please contact us at {PhoneCS}.

The following trip was cancelled.

Locator code: {2}

changeCancelHotel.changeOnlineHotelText:
To make changes to this reservation:

  1. Review the cancellation policy that applies to your existing reservation.
  2. Make a new reservation that meets your new criteria (new dates, room type, hotel, etc.).
  3. Cancel your existing reservation.

It is recommended that you make the new reservation before canceling your existing reservation in order to ensure availability. You can complete the entire process online, but if you need assistance, please call.
changeCancelHotel.policySubHead: Please read this important information before you change or cancel your reservation:
changeCancelHotel.policyText: Cancellations or changes more than 1 day prior to 12:01am Central Time on the day of arrival are subject to a {0} charge. Cancellation or changes within 1 day prior to 12:01 am Central Time on the day of arrival are subject to a charge equal to room and tax for the first night. Cancellations or changes after 12:01 am Central Time on the day of arrival are subject to a 100% penalty. We are sorry but refunds are not available for early check-out. This hotel is not authorized to make an exception to this policy.

What is a promo code?

A promo code is your key to redeeming special {Brand} discounts. To redeem, enter your promo code below, then click "Apply & Reprice." We'll apply the discount to the total cost when you pay. Promo codes can only be used once with each booking, and they're good only up to the total amount of your booking (including service fee and taxes) or promo code amount, whichever is less.

What is a promo code?

A promo code is your key to redeeming special {Brand} discounts. To redeem, enter your promo code below, then look for hotels marked with the {0} icon. pkgResultsSummary.aboutTimeRangeTitle: How we calculate the number of hotel nights
message.3156: error: You have chosen a combination of options that is not available. Please be sure you are making your choice from an updated options list.
pkgResultsSummary.aboutTimeRangeText:
The number of hotel nights in your vacation package is based on the flight arrival and departure times at your final destination.

Early-morning arrival: If the flight to your destination is scheduled to arrive at or before 5 a.m., the hotel check-in date will be the previous day. Since normal check-in times are between 1 p.m. and 3 p.m, this ensures that a hotel room will be available to you as soon as you arrive in the early morning.

Early-morning departure: If your return flight is scheduled to depart after midnight but before 3 a.m., the hotel check-out date will be the day before your departure, so you can keep the cost of your trip as low as possible. If you want to add a hotel room for the remaining time before your flight, simply book an extra night online after you complete your package purchase. You can also call us at {PhoneCS} or {OutsidePhoneCS} from outside the U.S.

Remember, we will always show you the number of hotel nights and check-in and check-out dates before completing your purchase.

rpsEmailHtml.message:
ebookers UK Revenue Protection is requesting further documentation in order to allow the above reservation to be completed.

ebookers UK requests a copy of the front and back of the credit card used for the reservation (credit card last 4 digits {0}) and a copy of the card holder's passport or government issued ID with a picture and signature.

These documents can be provided via fax or scanned to e-mail. The ebookers UK Revenue Protection Dept. recommends e-mail as the means of delivery since:

1) The copy quality is much higher.

2) This is a more secure means than via a phone line.

We apologize for any inconvenience this may cause, however due to the international credit card used and the nature of the itinerary, we must use this as a means of verification for complete credit card security.

Should we not receive a response to this message within 5 hours of its sending we reserve the right to cancel your reservation.
Thank you, as soon as these documents are received, the reservation will be fully confirmed

If you have any questions or concerns, please feel free to contact the ebookers UK Revenue Protection Department at 800-301-2594 or 312-894-4898 or you can e-mail us at revenueprotectionUK@ebookers.com.

We appreciate your understanding.

You may only cancel your entire {Brand} package and not any individual component. Refunds or credits for the airline portion of your {Brand} Package will be processed by the airline you selected.
aphTripPolicies.mor.changeText: Changes to your {Brand} package after the time of booking will incur both change fees and any additional amount attributable to any increase in the price of your {Brand} package that results from the changes. Changes are subject to availability and to restrictions and limitations imposed by airlines, hotels, and other travel providers. You will see separate charges totaling the amount of your change fee, one by {Brand} and one by the airline you selected for any additional collections attributable to the air portion of your package. Some airline tickets cannot be changed.

merchMarketingText.ODPairs.0:
Cheap flights from {0} ({2}) to {1} ({3})

Pay no {Brand} booking fees on single-carrier flights between {0} to {1}. That's good on flight-only reservations that originate from the U.S., Canada, Mexico or the Caribbean. Removing fees is just one way we can ensure cheap flights from {0} to {1}.

Get airfare alerts for {0} to {1} flights

Set your target price and travel dates, and we'll send you an alert if we find an airfare for {0} to {1} that meets or beats your price. Sign up for {Brand} Deals E-mail, so you'll receive late-breaking alerts about airfare sales on cheap flights from {0} to {1}.

Earn miles, choose seats on cheap flights from {0} to {1}

Add your frequent flier numbers when you book your cheap flights from {0} to {1} on {Brand} and accumulate miles on applicable flights. Also, use our interactive maps to select your seats on flights from {0} to {1} - aisle or window, front or back. We're not just concerned about finding you cheap flights from {0} to {1}, we want to ensure you get your airline miles and preferred seats too.

An entire support team for your {0} to {1} flights

ticketType.dpLowCostCarrierNoticeText:
This package is non changeable and non refundable.

You have selected a flight from a low-cost airline (shown by {0} ).

After you enter your details on our website, {Brand} will pass these to the low-cost airline on your behalf. After completing the booking you will receive two booking confirmations by email, one from the low-cost airline and one from {Brand} . The reference received from the airline is required for check in.

It is your responsibility to ensure that all details of your booking are correct before proceeding. Once you are satisfied, click 'Continue booking'.

On your payment card statement you will see separate charges totaling the amount of your package cost, one from {Brand} and one from the low-cost airline you selected

Additionally we must inform you that most low-cost airlines charge a payment card fee, which will be notified to you immediately prior to purchase. All these charges, including airline’s payment card fee, may be in another currency. Low-cost airlines may also charge additional fees for

checked baggage and for in-flight food and drink.

onlineCancelAir.creditedCancelInfo:
Cancel your tickets online quickly and easily --no phone calls or waiting. Cancellations are only made when and if you are ready.

Applying ticket value toward future travel

No refund will be issued to your credit card if you cancel your tickets. However, if you cancel the tickets before your departure date, you can apply the value of your ticket toward future travel.

When you're ready to book new flights, call the phone number below by the deadline. Your new flights must be on the same airline for the same travelers.

The cost of changing your tickets typically includes:
  • Airline change fee, per ticket
  • {Brand} change fee, per ticket
  • Fare difference

agreeAndPurchase.dpTermsLCCText:
• You will see separate charges on your payment card statement totaling the amount of your package cost, one from {Brand} and one from the low-cost airline you selected.
  • After completing the booking you will receive two booking confirmations by email, one from the airline and one from {Brand}. The reference received from the airline is required for check in.
  • It is your responsibility to ensure that all details of your booking are correct before proceeding. Once you are satisfied, click agree and book.
agreeAndPurchase.airTermsLCCText:
• You have selected a low cost flight. {Brand} will now contact the airline on your behalf. The booking will be made directly between you and the low cost airline.
  • After completing the booking you will receive two booking confirmations by email, one from the airline and one from {Brand}. The reference received from the airline is required for check in. For any changes or cancellations, you must contact the airline directly, quoting their reference.
  • It is your responsibility to ensure that all details of your booking are correct before proceeding. Once you are satisfied, click agree and book.
  • By clicking agree and book I confirm that I have read and agree to the
    terms and conditions
    and I acknowledge that this booking is being made on my behalf direct with the airline.

airResultsCard.charterFareMicrocontentTe:
Charter Flights are flights operated by private companies to selected destinations. These companies contract with commercial airlines to use their planes and crew, both of which must adhere to the same rigorous safety standards as commercial airlines. Charter flights may operate on certain days each week and may not depart every day as commercial airline do.

Please refer to the company’s {0} for the rules and regulations that apply to charter flight bookings.
contactCarrierHtml.introMessage:
Subject: A Change to Your Flight Itinerary ({0})

Dear {1},

Due to a significant change to your flight, {2} will be required to reissue your airline ticket.

Unfortunately, we cannot reissue the ticket. Please contact {2} at {3} to complete the process as soon as possible. Your new ticket will allow you to check in online at the kiosk at the airport.
contactCarrierHtml.closingMessage:
Thank you.

{Brand}

Passenger(s): {0}

{1} record locator: {2}

{Brand} Locator: {3}

*** This message was sent automatically. Please do not reply. ***

atol.certificate.heading: ATOL Certificate
atol.certificate.importantDocument: This is an important document. Make sure that you take it with you when you travel.
atol.certificate.copyright: Copyright UK Civil Aviation Authority. The ATOL Logo is a registered trade mark.
atol.certificate.subHeading_1: This confirms that your money is protected by the ATOL scheme and that you can get home if your travel company collapses.
atol.certificate.subHeading_2: This certificate sets out how the ATOL scheme will protect the people named on it for the parts of their trip listed below.
atol.certificate.issuing_pkg:
By issuing this ATOL certificate, under Regulation 1 of the Civil Aviation (Air Travel Organisers’ Licensing) Regulations 2012, {0} confirms that the trip to which it applies is sold in line with the ATOL held by the organiser named above.

The ATOL scheme is run by the Civil Aviation Authority and paid for by the Air Travel Trust. To see what that is and what you can expect, together with full information on its terms and conditions go to www.atol.org.uk.

As well as the protection of the ATOL scheme, you have protection under the Package Travel Regulations. For more information see www.direct.gov.uk in the Travel and Transport section.
atol.certificate.issuing_plus:
By issuing this ATOL certificate, under Regulation 17 of the Civil Aviation (Air Travel Organisers’ Licensing) Regulations 2012, {0} confirms that the parts of the trip listed above are sold in line with the ATOL held by {0} named above.

The ATOL scheme is run by the Civil Aviation Authority and paid for by the Air Travel Trust. To see what that is and what you can expect, together with full information on its terms and conditions, go to www.atol.org.uk.
atol.certificate.yourProtection_pkg:
Your protection

You are protected from when you were given this certificate to the end of your trip. If {0} stops trading, the passengers named above will either:

  1. complete their trip and return to the UK; or
  2. receive a refund.

Your protection depends on the terms of the ATOL scheme (available at www.atol.org.uk).

If {0} stops trading, you must follow the instructions at www.atol.org.uk (where there will be details of arrangements to bring people back to the UK, and information on how people can claim their money back) or you can call (+44) 20 7453 6350.
atol.certificate.yourProtection_plus:
Your protection

You are protected from when you were given this certificate to the end of your trip. If the provider of one of the parts of your trip listed above stops trading, in most circumstances, {0} must provide you with an alternative (at no extra cost) or offer you a full refund of the total ATOL-protected cost. See guidance on your rights at www.atol.org.uk. Please contact {0} on {1} or {2}.

If {0} stops trading and you are overseas, your flight arrangements should not be affected. However, you should check the instructions at www.atol.org.uk. Or, you can call (+44) 20 7453 6350. The ATOL website will also provide advice on what you must do if you have not yet left for your holiday.

If {0} stops trading, depending on the terms of the ATOL scheme (available at www.atol.org.uk), the passengers named above will either:

  1. be able to take and complete their trip, and return to the UK; or if that is not possible
  2. receive a refund for the total amount paid to {0}.
atol.certificate.whatsProtected_plus: What is protected and who is providing the protection?
atol.certificate.whatsProtectedText_pkg: You can find more detailed information on your booking, including price, on the confirmation you will receive from {0}.
atol.certificate.whatsProtectedText_plus: Further details about your booking and protection can be found in the table overleaf.
atol.certificate.noCertificate: This trip is not eligible for ATOL protection. <link url="http://www.caa.co.uk/default.aspx?catid=1080">Click here</link> for further information about ATOL.
atol.certificate.link.label: ATOL Certificate

pkgResultsSummary.overnightAdjustmentTex:
Early-morning arrival: If the flight to your destination is scheduled to arrive at or before 5 a.m., the hotel check-in date will be the previous day. Since normal check-in times are between 1 p.m. and 3 p.m, this ensures that a hotel room will be available to you as soon as you arrive in the early morning.

Early-morning departure: If your return flight is scheduled to depart after midnight but before 3 a.m., the hotel check-out date will be the day before your departure, so you can keep the cost of your trip as low as possible. If you want to add a hotel room for the remaining time before your flight, simply book an extra night online after you complete your package purchase. You can also call us at {PhoneCS} or {OutsidePhoneCS} from outside the U.S.

Remember, we will always show you the number of hotel nights and check-in and check-out dates before completing your purchase.

Your booking is not quite confirmed. Please make your payment as soon as possible, to ensure your chosen room is still available. Dear {0} ,

We’re really sorry to let you know your booking request with {Brand} at the {1} for {2} could not be completed. Bookings are subject to availability and room rates fluctuate on a constant basis. This may have affected your booking on this occasion. You will see the transaction reversed in your Alipay Account within the next 24-48 hours.

Your reference number is: {3}.

here to get started on your next {Brand} deal!

loyaltyInvite.instaCreditMessage:

You must select yes or no.
loyaltyInvite.ccContactInfo:
Agent: Say "Great! The application process only takes a few minutes. Once you are approved, you can begin enjoying all the benefits of your ORBITZ REWARDS Visa Card, including earning on this booking. I just need a few minutes to go over the credit card disclosure with you."

Read the highlighted text. Do not summarize or skip.

Say: "Would you like to continue with the approval process?" If the customer says no, then click link "No thanks, back to checkout".

Enter or confirm the customer's Name, Address, and Phone Numbers.

Say "By providing your phone number you agree to be contacted regarding your account via text message or telephone, including the user of pre-recorded auto-dialed calls. Standard mobile, message or data rates apply. Do we have consent to contact you at this/these number(s) for any and all purposes? " and click Next.
loyaltyInvite.ccContactInfoPreApprove:
Agent: Say "Great! The application process only takes a few minutes. Once you are approved, you can begin enjoying all the benefits of your ORBITZ REWARDS Visa Card, including earning on this booking. I just need a few minutes to go over the credit card disclosure with you."

Read the highlighted text. Do not summarize or skip.

Say: "Would you like to continue with the approval process?" If the customer says no, then click link "No thanks, back to checkout".

Say "Let me verify your contact information."

Read back the pre-filled information in the Contact Section. If you edit the information the account may not be approved today it might require additional review.

Say "By providing your phone number you agree to be contacted regarding your account via text message or telephone, including the user of pre-recorded auto-dialed calls. Standard mobile, message or data rates apply. Do we have consent to contact you at this/these number(s) for any and all purposes?" and click Next.

Ask the customer for their birth date, their social security number and annual household income. Click Next.

ncowDisclaimer.title: This round-trip consists of separate one-way tickets
ncowDisclaimer.terms:
You're about to buy a round-trip that's made up of separate one-way tickets - exclusively on {Brand}!

What you should know: {Brand} is getting you a great price by pairing non-partner, one-way tickets to create your round-trip. However, this means if you'd like to make any changes, you'll need to change each ticket individually. Change fees could apply to each. {0}

Please print both your e-ticket confirmations before starting travel.
